embeds.title: Server Rules
embeds.description:
**1. Keep inappropriate content out of the channels.**
> Be polite. Chatting is fine - keep toxicity to a certain level. No excessively outrageous hostile language either. 
> __Result:__ Warn & Mute

**2. Don't be too toxic!** 
> Try not to spam and don't go out of your way to attempt to cause other aggravation. 
> Being unconstrained and wild is fine on occasion, however, if your whole presence online is toxic, at that point it's best you search out to other servers.
> __Result:__ Warn & Kick

**3. Do not promote your server or DM advertise.**
> This will not be tolerated and it will lead to an automatic ban. 
> You are only allowed to promote in the <#775561210791723028> channel!
> __Result:__ Ban

**4. Do not post personal information about other members.**
> Do not post information or pictures of other people without their permission. 
> This server is supposed to be safe and friendly!
> __Result:__ Ban

**5. Keep this a drama-free server.**
> Do whatever it takes not to start or encourage unnecessary drama.
> Any type of serious harassment (blackmailing, doxxing, hate speech) may lead to a permanent ban.
> __Result:__ Warn & Ban

**6. Respect the staff team.**
> We're here to keep the server clean and relaxed; so when we ask you to stop doing something, please do so! If you have any questions or objections, feel free to create a ticket about it, or report inappropriate behavior. Do not ping staff unless there is a matter that needs immediate attention.
> __Result:__ Warn & Mute

**7. Posting any content related to privacy, cheats, cracks, exploits, or any kind of copyright breaching materials is forbidden. **
> __Result:__ Warn & Ban

**8. You must be 13 or older to be on this server, if you are underage, you will be removed.**
> __Result:__ Kick

**9. Your nickname must include your real name and age. You can change your nickname by clicking the server name in the upper left corner, and then clicking 'change nickname'**
> __Result:__ Warn & Kick

**10. Absolutely no flirting/suggestive language. There are minors on this server. If any evidence is found of flirting between a minor and adult, the adult will very likely be reported to the authorities.**
> __Result:__ Warn & Ban

embeds.title: Voice Channel Rules
embeds.description:
**1. No NSFW**
> Any sort of NSFW content is not allowed. This includes but is not limited to: streaming NSFW/18+, Talking about NSFW or Playing NSFW Songs. Breaking any of these is a Direct Ban.
> __Result:__ Ban

**2. No Ear-Rape**
> Do not Ear-Rape in Voice Channels. In simple words, it means to Shout inside A Voice Channel. Nothing much to be explained, pretty Self Explanatory.
> __Result:__ Warn & Access Revoked

**3. Don't use bots everywhere**
> Do not use music bots everywhere. We have a few specific channels only for music lovers, go there! And also, give people a chance to pick up their song. Everyone has different likes, don't they? ;D
> __Result:__ Warn & Ban

_Verify by reacting to the green checkmark. These rules and punishment may change and vary through person to person._
